articles.author: Ramesh Ponnuru
articles.title: What Does It Mean to ‘Vote with Trump’?
articles.description: A lot of Democratic challengers have run ads against House Republicans who they say vote "with Trump" too often.
articles.content: A lot of Democratic challengers have run ads against House Republicans who they say vote “with Trump” too often. I mentioned in passing the other day that I don’t think this statistic is very informative. At Bloomberg Opinion, I explain why.
